data.title: Henri Spaak was NATO's second Secretary General…
data.meta_description: Belgian politician Paul-Henri Spaak was NATO's second Secretary General. He was nicknamed "Mister Europe" because of the huge influence he had on European…
data.text:
That’s a wrap! NATO Leaders concluded a successful three-day summit in 🇺🇸 Washington, where they took major decisions to: 🇺🇦 Increase support to Ukraine 🛡️ Keep our people safe 🤝 Deepen global partnerships #NATOSummit

Mission accomplished 🏅🥾 The Supreme Headquarters Allied Powers Europe (SHAPE) team finished #Nijmegen 4 day march 🇳🇱 The team joined over 45,000 walkers from over 70 countries, including NATO Allies and partner troops for the the largest multiple-day marching event in the world Full story: https://lnkd.in/dp7b9cHu

Paratrooper training isn’t for the faint of heart 🪂 A US Army soldier steps off a jump tower during a basic airborne course at Fort Moore 🇺🇸, which trains 13,000 paratroopers per year, including troops from the US Army, NATO Allies and other foreign partners

🛋️ NATO partnered with YouTube at the #NATOSummit to create a studio where Allied ministers and experts could discuss NATO’s policies, goals and the decisions adopted in Washington Tap the link to watch all their interviews → https://lnkd.in/dxUAAwTY

Let's get ready to rumble 💥 🥊 Soldiers from 🇫🇷 🇬🇧 🇺🇸 put their strength, agility and fighting spirit to the test in a friendly boxing competition organised by NATO’s multinational battlegroup 🇪🇪 Estonia

Allies strengthen relationship with NATO Partner Australia 🇦🇺 7 NATO Allies are participating in a Royal Australian Air Force exercise, demonstrating the commitment to deploy a persistent, credible and reliable presence in the Indo-Pacific region when needed Full story: https://bit.ly/4d7SVWY

NATO is stronger and safer when it stands with like-minded partners. At the Washington #NATOSummit, Secretary General @jensstoltenberg underlined the strong and deepening cooperation between NATO and its Indo-Pacific partners 🇦🇺 🇯🇵 🇳🇿 🇰🇷

What is NATO, who pays for it and why is it still needed? Tap the link to learn more: https://lnkd.in/dv8S_zqp

Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg announces appointment of new Special Representative for the Southern Neighbourhood Javier Colomina will serve as NATO’s focal point for the region. He will be responsible for coordinating and enhancing the visibility of NATO’s efforts in the south and will strengthen engagement with partners. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/dUTfAP6V

✈️ For the first time as a member, the Swedish Air Force participated in NATO operations across the North Atlantic. 🇸🇪 Sweden deployed aircraft and staff to 🇮🇸 Iceland to conduct airborne surveillance flights during the #NATOSummit The mission again confirmed that after long years of close cooperation as a partner, the Swedish Air Force is well integrated into NATO’s air activities and interoperable within Alliance Air and Space Power 🔗 https://lnkd.in/enkStMAH
